verses.name: 2 Chronicles 24:8
verses.text: And at the king’s commandment they made a chest, and set it without at the gate of the house of the Lord.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 24:9
verses.text: And they made a proclamation through Judah and Jerusalem, to bring in to the Lord the collection that Moses the servant of God laid upon Israel in the wilderness.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 24:10
verses.text: And all the princes and all the people rejoiced, and brought in, and cast into the chest, until they had made an end.
